text.more: Objects are color coded by community, grouped by industry and arranged by date and location. Click object to open information pane which includes full text. As hyperlinking is unavailable for this tool, copy and paste the contents of the "object location" field to visit the item's page.
text.intro: Representation of  Immigrant Communities in the Pacific Northwest, 1880-1930
text.title: Mapping Language:

legend.nodeLabel: Community Color Codes: Fuchsia = Black, Red = Chinese,  Light Purple = Irish,  Orange = Italian,  Dark Purple = Filipino,  Brown = Finnish,  Light Blue = German,  Dark Blue = Greek,  Pink = Hindu,  Light Green = Japanese,  Dark Green = Korean,  Yellow = Native Americans,  Dark Green = Norwegian,  Aqua = Polish
